name: Larry's new wheelchair
description:
In this third person game you will control Larry, a man in a wheelchair who moves slowly but can be quite lethal.
The game consist of 7 different levels in which you'll have to progress by fighting enemies, surviving hordes of enemies, bosses and solving kinder garden level puzzles.
You'll start the game with 3 basic moves (The ability to explode and not harm yourself, a spin that hurts your enemies and the ability to fart and stun enemies).
Through the levels you'll be unlocking new moves. This moves make the game easier for you but require higher skills to be applied correctly.
The game is not made with the intention of offending anyone. If you decide to play it I hope you have fun.
